TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː z t ɛ l ɐ æ s k ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ z ð ɪ ŋ z w ɪ v h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔː s ɪ k s s p oʊ n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v t ɪ k s l ɪ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n ɛ k f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː p l æ s t ɪ k s s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oʊ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð ɪ z ð ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ ð ɹ ɜː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ð w iː ɡ oʊ m ɪ t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ɪ s t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
